Class TranslationUtils

Deprecated. As of MacOSX 10.2

public class TranslationUtils
extends Object

Static utilities for converting data formats; useful when working with Transferable objects.

toByteArray

public static byte[] toByteArray(Object o)
                          throws IOException
Deprecated. 
Attempts to convert an object into a byte[] array. It knows how to handle InputStreams, Readers, and Serializable objects (which should be the only kinds of objects available from Transferables.) Other types of objects will cause an IOException to be thrown.

toCharArray

public static char[] toCharArray(Reader in)
                          throws IOException
Deprecated. 
Reads a Reader into a char[] array.
